definition: to be clogged up/to be congested (traffic, computer network etc)
to hold/to embrace/to wrap around/to gather around (sb)/to throng/to swarm/to support/Taiwan pr. [yong3]
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
strategic pass/tactical border position
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

sentences.english: When using this approach congestion control can be implemented manually.
sentences.chinese: 當使用這種方法的時候，擁塞控制可以手動地實現。

sentences.english: The traffic banked up at the intersection.
sentences.chinese: 車輛在交叉路口擁塞起來。

sentences.english: If you're going to use a congestion metaphor, I'd suggest defining what that means.
sentences.chinese: 若想使用擁塞作爲比喻，我建議先定義其真正含義。

sentences.english: Active queue management(AQM) is very significant for network congestion control.
sentences.chinese: 主動隊列管理對於解決網路擁塞具有重要意義。

sentences.english: Section 3 explains its congestion control algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 第3節說明了它的擁塞控制算法。

sentences.english: He deplored the extent of traffic congestion in urban areas.
sentences.chinese: 他對市區交通的擁塞程度深感遺憾。

sentences.english: Rate-based congestion control has been adopted by the ATM Forum as standard.
sentences.chinese: 基於速率的擁塞控制方案已成爲ATM行業標準。

sentences.english: But I was caught in the traffic.
sentences.chinese: 但是我受阻於路上交通擁塞。

sentences.english: The increase of this kind of traffic can result in unfairness and danger of congestion collapse.
sentences.chinese: 這類流量的增加帶來了不公平性和新的擁塞崩潰現象。

sentences.english: The congestion of network is solved preferably using time-triggered operation in the communication of CAN protocol.
sentences.chinese: CAN總線報文傳輸用時間觸發操作解決網絡擁塞。

sentences.english: The research on ABR multipoint-to-point congestion control is in its early phase.
sentences.chinese: ABR多點對點連接的擁塞控制研究尚處於起步階段。

sentences.english: The cars backed up for miles.
sentences.chinese: 汽車擁塞，首尾相接長達數英里。

sentences.english: A rate-based layered multicast congestion control arithmetic is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於速率的分層組播擁塞控制算法。

sentences.english: The stack reacts to the timeout by resetting the congestion window back to an empty state.
sentences.chinese: 棧對超時的響應是把擁塞窗口重設回空狀態。

sentences.english: Underspecification also means that there is little thought for congestion control.
sentences.chinese: 不指定也意味着對擁塞處理考慮不足。

definition: urban heat island effect
bad money drives out good money (economics)
pinyin: lie4 bi4 qu1 zhu2 liang2 bi4

definition: lit. to see a gap and stick in a needle (idiom); fig. to make use of every second and every inch
to become a mere formality

(of a ship, train etc) not carrying any load (i.e. no passengers or freight etc)/(electricity) no-load (used to describe the condition of a transformer when there is no load connected to its secondary coil)
many men, a great force (idiom); many hands provide great strength/There is safety in numbers.
to be drowned (figurative and literal)
to whine on for days (idiom)/to endlessly grumble complaints/incessant whining
time bomb
lit. as if sitting on pins and needles (idiom)/fig. to be in an uncomfortable situation
panic-stricken
increasingly/more and more/ever more/all the more
no way out/nowhere to go/trapped beyond hope of rescue/painted into a corner
pontoon bridge
civil society
to turn peril into safety (idiom); to avert a danger (esp. political or medical)
